tourBios.intlVics: (2) 2006 Abierto del Sur [TLA]. 2009 Abierto de Hacienda Chicureo [TLA]
tourBios.carHigh:
2015: Only top-25 in 16 starts (4 cuts made) on PGA TOUR Latinoamérica was T23 at the Volvo Colombian Classic in September… Finished 129th on the Order of Merit… Edged Bolivia's Sebastián MacLean in a playoff for the fifth spot at the Developmental Series Final in December to secure full exempt status for the PGA TOUR Latinoamérica 2016 season… Had two top-5s on the Argentine Tour, a solo third at the Abierto Norpatagónico and a T5 at the 97th Abierto del Sur (DevSeries event).

2014: Earned PGA TOUR Latinoamérica status with a T16 at the Lima, Peru Q-School in January… Best finish in 17 Tour starts (6 cuts made) was T26 at the Hyundai-BBVA Abierto de Chile in November… Finished 123rd on the Order of Merit… Best finish on the Argentine Tour was T9 at the Abierto del Litoral (DevSeries event).

2013: Made one cut in four starts on PGA TOUR Latinoamérica. Tried to earn his card back in February, but missed on his attempt by finishing T78 at the Q-School held in Lima, Peru.

2012: Earned PGA TOUR Latinoamérica status with a T5 at the Buenos Aires, Argentina Q-School in June… Had one top10, two top-25s and 5 cuts made in 11 starts to finish the PGA TOUR Latinoamérica inaugural season ranked 57th on the Order of Merit… Only top-10 was T7 at the Dominican Republic Open in November.

2009: Won the Abierto de Hacienda Chicureo in Chile for his second career win on the Tour de las Americas.

2006: On his very first start as a professional, at the age of 18 years, 9 months, he went on to win the Abierto del Sur in Mar del Plata, Argentina to become the youngest winner ever on the Tour de las Americas.
tourBios.personal: Twitter name is @luchogiomett… Instagram name is @luchogiom
tourBios.exmtStatus: Exempt - Top-5 Finisher 2015 Dev Series Final

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA TOUR Latinoameri in 2016 is T32nd at the 85 Abierto OSDE del Centro presentado por FiberCorp.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T61st in Par Breakers on the Latinoamérica.
